subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte held the Phillies to a walk and an infield single and Jason Giambi pulled a Cole Hamels fastball for a three-run homer in the first inning of a 7-7 tie at Legends Field.
snippet: Andy Pettitte held the Phillies to a walk and an infield single and Jason Giambi pulled a Cole Hamels fastball for a three-run homer in the first inning of a 7-7 tie at Legends Field.
